SDK Assistant
Welcome to the OpenRouter SDK Chat Interface! I'm here to help you with testing your AI models. What would you like to try today?
You
What can I do with the OpenRouter SDK?
SDK Assistant

The OpenRouter SDK allows you to:

  1. Access 50+ AI models from different providers with a single API
  2. Create and manage function calling workflows
  3. Build autonomous agents with various capabilities
  4. Integrate with vector databases and other tools
  5. Route requests to the best model based on cost, performance, or capabilities

You can explore available functions in the Functions tab of this dashboard!

Try asking about available models, functions, or how to use the SDK
